title: make delay for stack to resolve configurable

comments.body:
A change for this has been committed.
The default, min, max are open for suggestions. Also needs a different icon?

**Status:** Started
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
I suggest the following

default: 2s
min: 0s
max: 3s
resolution: 0.5s

eg 0, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3

I think we can use the same icon as the pop up delay.
